means: 吓呆，使麻木( petrify的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I found the climb absolutely petrifying.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得这次爬山太吓人了。

list.abs: 亚历桑那州的石化森林(Petrified Forest)、大峡谷、纪念碑山谷科罗拉多州的梅莎维德共九个国家公园， 加上天然石桥(Natural Bridges…
黄石国家公园 - 第11页 ...  Stemboat 汽船喷泉  PETRIFIED FOREST 化石林 ->红松化石  Idaho Falls - Snake river 风光.
...黄铁矿等所交代。统称为石化木(petrified wood)、中国古代很早就了解石化木的成因、唐代有著名诗人陆龟蒙就有(东阳多名山。金华为最大、其问绕古松.
petrified honeycomb 化石蜂巢同beckitepetrified wood 硅化木petrosilex 霏细岩
游戏英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 假死 Feign 石化 Petrify 穿刺 Pierce.

entry.def: If something petrifies you, it makes you feel very frightened.

example.ex: Prison petrifies me and I don't want to go there.
example.tran: 监狱太可怕了，我不想去那里。

entry.def: If something such as a society or institution petrifies, or if something petrifies it, it stops changing and developing.

example.ex: ...the fear that a political deadlock may petrify economic initiatives.
example.tran: 对政治僵局可能会使经济发展停滞的担心

auth_sentence.content: It was a petrifying but exhilarating welcome to the wilderness.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a petrifying but exhilarating welcome to the wilderness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a petrifying but exhilarating welcome to the wilderness.

auth_sentence.content: She had almost given up speech, for her voice scratched and whistled oddly in her petrifying larynx.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had almost given up speech, for her voice scratched and whistled oddly in her petrifying larynx.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had almost given up speech, for her voice scratched and whistled oddly in her petrifying larynx.
